article_title: Who is the affluent generation now?
article_text:
Photo: Getty Images

Is the younger generation coming up, or is the older generation going down?

According to the 2015 Ipsos Affluent Survey USA, whatever is causing it, there are now more Gen Xers among the affluent class than there are baby boomers.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Marlene Y. Satter
article_metadata.description: Baby boomers are no longer the most affluent demographic, according to a recent study.
